description: The CASE_HISTORY table contains the case history information associated with each case record stored in the CASE_MGMT table. It contains details of all changes that have ever been made to the case record. It stores such information as the action performed, the time and date the action was performed, and the user that performed the action.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the case history. For example, if the case has two history events, the first will have a line value of 1, while the second will have a line value of 2.

columns.name: ACTION_DATETIME
columns.description: The date and time associated with the case history action entry.

columns.name: ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number of the action associated with this history entry.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Create Case


Open Case


Re-Open Case


Close Case


Create Contact


Review


Case Name Changed


Priority Changed


Link Referral


Unlink Referral


Link Claim


Unlink Claim


Link Charge


Unlink Charge


Change Bed Days Start Date


Change Bed Days End Date


Change Estimated Bed Days


Change Override Bed Days


Change Converted Bed Days


Change Bed Days Day Type


Delete Bed Days Row


Create Event


Edit Event


Link Episode


Unlink Episode

columns.name: PREV_VALUE
columns.description: The "Note or Previous Value" information from the case history action.

columns.name: ACTION_USER_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the user who performed the action associated with this line of the change history.

columns.name: HISTORY_REV_DUE_DATE
columns.description: Tracks the current review due date.
